bibl.note: I. Revisions to the Published Catalogue [1892]. - II. Additions to the Published Catalogue. - III. The Development of the Collection. - App.: The Fetter Lane Hoard.

London, British Museum, Department of Coins and Medals, 1991, 151 pp. et 12 pll. £10.
